A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''March 30, 2010''', at 15:11 UTC, to fix bugs.<ref>[[wordofnotch:484051625|"Infdev's been updated, bugs have been fixed"]] – [[The Word of Notch]], March 30, 2010</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* The clouds no longer "follow" the [[player]] along the x- and z-axes.

== Bugs ==
* Placing [[torch]]es sometimes causes a game crash.
